io.kyma.project.connector.event

Class EventGatewayService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.kyma.project.connector.event.EventGatewayService

  • @Service
public class EventGatewayService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service that forwards events to Kyma/Extension Factory using an existing Connection Model and an Event Object.
    Author:
    Andreas Krause
    See Also:
    EventModel, ConnectionModel

      • writeEvent

        public void writeEvent(ConnectionModel connectionModel,
                       EventModel event)
        Publishes a given event to the connection specified in the ConnectionModel.
        Parameters:
        connectionModel - The connection to be used for event forwarding
        event - the event to be published
        Throws:
        ApplicationConnectorException - if connection fails
